item.title: AWS for NodeJs developer
item.description: _index What is AWS a developer’s perspective? From a developer’s perspective, Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a cloud computing platform that provides a broad set of services, including compute power, storage options, networking and content delivery, database services, analytics, and more.

item.title: Before Starting
item.description: _index How to Improve my productivity in backend development? Develop a systems approach. Develop an orderly, methodical process for managing your workflow that addresses your specific type of work and environment.

item.title: Develop a systems approach
item.description: How to Develop a systems approach ? Identify the main components and critical relationships of the system. Begin by taking a step back and looking for ways to break down the system into its various components, processes, and structures.

item.title: Eliminate distractions
item.description: How to Eliminate distractions as a developer? Turn off notifications: Notifications can be a huge distraction. This can be especially true for mobile apps and social media notifications.

item.title: Have a plan in place
item.description: How to make a plan before starting the development? Develop a clear overview of the system: Identify the goal, analyze the environment and determine resources available to accomplish it.
